alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Kittson; Pennington; Roseau; West Marshall; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Marshall, north central Polk, southeastern Kittson, southwestern Roseau and northwestern Pennington Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 600 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Alvarado to near Tabor to near Sherack. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren, Karlstad, Stephen, Argyle, Newfolden, Alvarado and Euclid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Kittson; Pennington; Roseau; West Marshall; West Polk
